name: Alex Neeb
part_bio: Born in Waterloo Co, Ontario, the son of Veronica (Herber) and John Neeb.---Alex's birth year on this stone is cut to say 1876, I have viewed his birth record (#031404) and confirmed that his real birth date was in 1877
bio:
NEEB ALEX NEEB 1876-1948 HIS WIFE BARBARA WITZEL 1883-1940 THEIR CHILDREN ALFRED 1907-1909
HARVEY 1920-1964
ESTHER 1910-1968
WILLIAM WITZEL
BORN MAR. 29, 1857
DIED MAR. 5, 1935
HIS WIFE MARY FINKBEINER
BORN MAY 2, 1860-DIED MAY 3, 1927
IRENE WITZEL
BORN 1899-DIED 1947
